definition: later than usual or than expected, being or occurring at an advanced period of time or after a usual or expected time
details:
adverb
- later than usual or than expected
= example: later than usual or than expected
= synonyms: belatedly, tardily
- in the recent past
= synonyms: recently
- to an advanced time
= synonyms: deep
- at an advanced age or stage
= example: at an advanced age or stage
adjective
- being or occurring at an advanced period of time or after a usual or expected time
= example: being or occurring at an advanced period of time or after a usual or expected time
- at or toward an end or late period or stage of development
= example: at or toward an end or late period or stage of development
= synonyms: later
- of a later stage in the development of a language or literature
- after the expected or usual time
= synonyms: belated, tardy
- having died recently
- (used especially of persons) of the immediate past
= synonyms: previous, former
- of the immediate past or just previous to the present time
= synonyms: recent
